DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, placebo controlled, parallel group dose escalation trial to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and activity of four sequential dose tiers of MRX-801 and ultrasound as an adjunctive therapy to tissue plasminogen activator (tPA) treatment in subjects with acute ischemic stroke.
DOC.criteria: Acute ischemic stroke Occlusion demonstrated by transcranial Doppler ultrasound Eligible for tPA Right to left cardiac shunt Moderate to severe COPD Uncontrolled hypertension
